private_information: I may move only disks: A, B, C, D (A is smallest, D larger).
I can perform only primitive moves that place a smaller disk on an empty peg or on a larger disk.
agent_1.goal: Contribute moves (limited to disks A-D) toward achieving the global Tower of Hanoi goal.

private_information: I may move only disks: E, F, G.
I can perform only primitive moves that place a smaller disk on an empty peg or on a larger disk.
agent_2.goal: Contribute moves (limited to disks E-G) toward achieving the global Tower of Hanoi goal.

private_information: I may move only disks: H, I, J (J is largest).
I can perform only primitive moves that place a smaller disk on an empty peg or on a larger disk.
agent_3.goal: Contribute moves (limited to disks H-J) toward achieving the global Tower of Hanoi goal.

private_information: I coordinate and integrate move proposals from the three agents.
I must produce a final PDDL domain and problem compatible with the FastDownwards planner and an ordered list of primitive moves abiding by agent restrictions and Tower of Hanoi rules.
orchestrator.goal: Integrate agent move proposals to produce a single correct plan (PDDL domain + problem targeting FastDownwards) and an ordered list of primitive moves in the format 'agent_i: move disk X from peg1 to peg2'.

public_information: There are three pegs: left, middle, right.
There are 10 disks labelled A (smallest) through J (largest).
Initial configuration (top -> bottom) on left peg: A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J; middle and right pegs are empty.
Tower of Hanoi rules apply: only one disk may be moved at a time; a disk can only be placed on an empty peg or on a larger disk.
Agent movement restrictions: agent_1 can move A-D; agent_2 can move E-G; agent_3 can move H-J.
Goal configuration: left peg (top -> bottom) A, D, E, F, G, H, I, J; middle peg (top -> bottom) B; right peg (top -> bottom) C.

generate_moves.system_prompt: You are agent_1, responsible for moving only disks A, B, C, D. Provide move proposals (primitive moves) that obey Tower of Hanoi rules and your disk-moving permissions.
You are agent_2, responsible for moving only disks E, F, G. Provide move proposals (primitive moves) that obey Tower of Hanoi rules and your disk-moving permissions.
You are agent_3, responsible for moving only disks H, I, J. Provide move proposals (primitive moves) that obey Tower of Hanoi rules and your disk-moving permissions.

pddl.system_prompt: You are the orchestrator. Integrate move proposals from all agents and produce a single consistent plan. You must output a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem compatible with the FastDownwards planner. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
